title: Your shop reset
body:
Is it just me that thinks it's unfair that some people get to have several discounts just because they were "lucky" enough to see what they had before the reset? 
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Yeah it wasn't intentional to offer two different sets, but it would be more unfair to not honor deals that a player wanted with the first set.  That's why we're looking into offering those deals if they put in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Those who didn't receive the first step still get solid deals since the personalized store came back up.
